name: Royal R++ Builder
short_description:
This project is under planning phase..
 
Royal R++ Builder is an Visual Rad IDE for the R++ and the R language for users who will built dotJET applications for Windows and Linux and later also MacOSX, IOS on IPhone, Android and Windows Mobile as well. Users can build and run different types of applications by using the visual gui designer inside Royal R++ Builder for drawing and placing widgets and components on forms and then write code in the R/R++ Language. Royal R++ is going to be built for the new .Jet Framework which is still under construction and planning phase
summary: An Visual IDE for developing in R/R++
